entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -22.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 02:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -22.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -25.6°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
